TLabel: Non-Recourse Debt
Doc: Amount of debt for which creditor does not have general recourse to the debtor but rather has recourse only to the property used for collateral in the transaction or other specific property.

TLabel: Short-term Debt
Doc: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: Debt Default, Short-term Debt, Amount
Doc: Amount of outstanding short-term debt or borrowing associated with any securities or credit agreement for which there has been a default in principal, interest, sinking fund, or redemption provisions, or any breach of covenant that existed at the end of the period and subsequently has not been cured.

TLabel: Certain Loans Acquired in Transfer Not Accounted for as Debt Securities, Allowance for Loan Losses
Doc: Reserve for loans impairments recorded after acquisition as a result of current information and events which result in it being probable that estimated cash flows will be less than previously expected or because actual cash flows are less than cash flows previously expected. This relates to loans not accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

TLabel: Additional Paid in Capital
Doc: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

TLabel: Convertible Subordinated Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Premium, Noncurrent
Doc: Amount of debt premium to be amortized after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: Interest and Dividends Payable, Current
Doc: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of (a) interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred, and (b) dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding (also includes dividends collected on behalf of another owner of securities that are being held by the entity). Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TLabel: Other Commitment
Doc: Minimum amount of other commitment not otherwise specified in the taxonomy. Excludes commitments explicitly modeled in the taxonomy, including but not limited to, long-term and short-term purchase commitments, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, supply commitments, registration payment arrangements, leases, debt, product warranties, guarantees, environmental remediation obligations, and pensions.

TLabel: AOCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Adjustment, after Tax
Doc: Amount, after tax, of accumulated unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

TLabel: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Accumulated Unrecognized Gain
Doc: Amount of accumulated unrecognized gain on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

TLabel: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
Doc: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

TLabel: Debt, Current
Doc: Amount of short-term debt and current maturity of long-term debt and capital lease obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: Subordinated Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of collateralized/uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion. Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind the primary lender of the company.

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Fair Value Disclosure
Doc: Fair value portion of debt instrument payable, including, but not limited to, notes payable and loans payable.

TLabel: Debt, Long-term and Short-term, Combined Amount
Doc: Represents the aggregate of total long-term debt, including current maturities and short-term debt.

TLabel: Other Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: Junior Subordinated Debenture Owed to Unconsolidated Subsidiary Trust, Noncurrent
Doc: The noncurrent portion of the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

TLabel: Convertible Subordinated Debt
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt, as of the balance sheet date, initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TLabel: CurrentPortionOfDebt
Doc: Current portion of debt.

TLabel: Subordinated Debt, Current
Doc: The portion of the carrying value of subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle, if longer. Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TLabel: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs, Noncurrent
Doc: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent.

TLabel: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation
Doc: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as noncurrent.

TLabel: Long-term Debt, Gross
Doc: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

TLabel: Medium-term Notes, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying value at the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as noncurrent.

TLabel: Unsecured Debt, Current
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, uncollateralized debt obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

TLabel: Subordinated Debt
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TLabel: Secured Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying amount of collateralized debt obligations with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer, excluding the current portion. Obligations include, but not limited to, mortgage loans, chattel loans, and other borrowings secured by assets.

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
Doc: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

TLabel: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Including Current Maturities
Doc: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, including portion classified as current.

TLabel: Liabilities, Other than Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: Aggregated carrying amounts of obligations as of the balance sheet date, excluding long-term debt, incurred as part of the normal operations that are expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Alternate captions include Total Deferred Credits and Other Liabilities.

TLabel: Secured Debt
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

TLabel: Junior Subordinated Notes
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments.

TLabel: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Federal Home Loan Bank Assessments
Doc: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, before Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners (distributions to owners). Includes, but is not limited to, foreign currency translation, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gain (loss) on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss related to factors other than credit loss on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, and increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

TLabel: Other Long-term Debt, Current
Doc: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
Doc: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TLabel: Convertible Debt, Fair Value Disclosures
Doc: Fair value portion of borrowing which can be exchanged for a specified number of another security at the option of the issuer or the holder, for example, but not limited to, the entity's common stock.

TLabel: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Current
Doc: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as current.

TLabel: Contractual Obligation
Doc: Amount of contractual obligation, including but not limited to, long-term debt, capital lease obligations, operating lease obligations, purchase obligations, and other commitments.

TLabel: Convertible Subordinated Debt, Current
Doc: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment upon liquidation of the entity's assets.

TLabel: Unsecured Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

TLabel: Convertible Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying amount of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date, net of the amount due in the next twelve months or greater than the normal operating cycle, if longer. The debt is convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

TLabel: Long-term Debt, Current Maturities
Doc: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt, classified as current. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

TLabel: Long-term Debt
Doc: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

TLabel: Secured Debt, Current
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, collateralized debt obligations due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer. Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

TLabel: Capitalization, Long-term Debt and Equity
Doc: This element represents the total consolidated (as applicable) capitalization of the entity which is comprised of its long-term debt and equity instruments. The table may be detailed by subsidiary (legal entity) and include information by type of debt or equity detailed by instrument.

TLabel: Convertible Notes Payable, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Convertible Notes Payable, excluding current portion. Convertible Notes Payable is a written promise to pay a note which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another, related security, at the option of the issuer and the holder.

TLabel: Unsecured Debt
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

TLabel: Junior Subordinated Debenture Owed to Unconsolidated Subsidiary Trust
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value of junior subordinated long-term debt owed to unconsolidated subsidiary trusts as of the balance sheet date. Such debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets and was initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain (Loss), before Tax
Doc: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

TLabel: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
Doc: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

TLabel: Long-term Debt, Fair Value
Doc: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

TLabel: Convertible Debt, Current
Doc: The portion of the carrying value of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Convertible debt is a financial instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

TLabel: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
Doc: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

TLabel: Junior Subordinated Notes, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Junior Subordinated Notes, which have a lower priority than senior instruments, excluding current portion.

TLabel: Retained Earnings, Unappropriated
Doc: A segregation of retained earnings which is available for dividend distribution. Earnings not paid out as dividends but instead reinvested in the core business or used to pay off debt. Unappropriated profit is part of shareholder equity. Also called cumulative distributions or earned surplus or accumulated earnings or unappropriated profit.

TLabel: Secured Debt, Other
Doc: Amount of collateralized debt obligations classified as other.

TLabel: Convertible Notes Payable, Current
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term debt due within one year or the operating cycle if longer identified as Convertible Notes Payable. Convertible Notes Payable is a written promise to pay a note which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another, related security, at the option of the issuer and the holder.

TLabel: Medium-term Notes
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value at the balance sheet date of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

TLabel: Senior Notes, Current
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term notes having the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to debt holders having a lesser priority of repayment.

TLabel: Short-term Debt, Fair Value
Doc: This element represents the portion of the balance sheet assertion valued at fair value by the entity whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission. This item represents the amount of short-term debt existing as of the balance sheet date.

TLabel: Secured Debt, Repurchase Agreements
Doc: Carrying value, as of the balance sheet date, of securities sold under agreements to repurchase where the transferor maintains effective control over the assets, accounting for them as secured debt.

TLabel: Interest Payable, Current
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TLabel: Debt and Lease Obligation
Doc: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

TLabel: Interest Payable
Doc: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

TLabel: Other Long-term Debt
Doc: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Carrying Amount of Equity Component
Doc: The carrying amount of the equity component of convertible debt which may be settled in cash upon conversion.

TLabel: Debtor-in-Possession Financing, Borrowings Outstanding
Doc: Amount of debtor-in-possession borrowings outstanding.

TLabel: Convertible Debt
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying amount of debt identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument (typically the entity's common stock) as of the balance sheet date, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

TLabel: Medium-term Notes, Current
Doc: Carrying value at the balance sheet date of the current portion of a financial instrument used to receive debt funding on a regular basis with original maturities ranging from 5-10 years.

TLabel: Current debt instruments issued
Doc: The amount of current debt instruments issued. [Refer: Debt instruments issued]

TLabel: Debt and Lease Obligation
Doc: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

TLabel: Debt instruments issued
Doc: The amount of instruments issued by the entity that represent indebtedness.

TLabel: Non-current debt instruments issued
Doc: The amount of non-current debt instruments issued. [Refer: Debt instruments issued]

TLabel: Accumulated Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements
Doc: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements.

TLabel: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs, Noncurrent
Doc: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent.

TLabel: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Federal Home Loan Bank Assessments
Doc: Amount of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, before Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners (distributions to owners). Includes, but is not limited to, foreign currency translation, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gain (loss) on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss related to factors other than credit loss on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, and increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

TLabel: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
Doc: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

TLabel: AOCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Adjustment, after Tax
Doc: Amount, after tax, of accumulated unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

TLabel: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
Doc: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

TLabel: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs, Current
Doc: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs classified as current.

TLabel: Capitalization, Long-term Debt and Equity
Doc: This element represents the total consolidated (as applicable) capitalization of the entity which is comprised of its long-term debt and equity instruments. The table may be detailed by subsidiary (legal entity) and include information by type of debt or equity detailed by instrument.

TLabel: Convertible Debt
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying amount of debt identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument (typically the entity's common stock) as of the balance sheet date, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

TLabel: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Long-term Debt
Doc: Amount of long-term debt due within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

TLabel: Contractual Obligation
Doc: Amount of contractual obligation, including but not limited to, long-term debt, capital lease obligations, operating lease obligations, purchase obligations, and other commitments.

TLabel: Convertible Subordinated Debt
Doc: Including the current and noncurrent portions, the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt, as of the balance sheet date, initially scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TLabel: AOCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale with Allowance for Credit Loss, Cumulative Gain (Loss), after Tax
Doc: Amount, after tax, of accumulated unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) with allowance for credit loss.

TLabel: Debtor-in-Possession Financing, Borrowings Outstanding
Doc: Amount of debtor-in-possession borrowings outstanding.

TLabel: Convertible Debt, Fair Value Disclosures
Doc: Fair value portion of borrowing which can be exchanged for a specified number of another security at the option of the issuer or the holder, for example, but not limited to, the entity's common stock.

TLabel: Debt Default, Short-term Debt, Amount
Doc: Amount of outstanding short-term debt or borrowing associated with any securities or credit agreement for which there has been a default in principal, interest, sinking fund, or redemption provisions, or any breach of covenant that existed at the end of the period and subsequently has not been cured.

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Premium
Doc: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt premium.

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
Doc: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

TLabel: Convertible Notes Payable, Current
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term debt due within one year or the operating cycle if longer identified as Convertible Notes Payable. Convertible Notes Payable is a written promise to pay a note which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another, related security, at the option of the issuer and the holder.

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Carrying Amount of Equity Component
Doc: The carrying amount of the equity component of convertible debt which may be settled in cash upon conversion.

TLabel: Convertible Notes Payable, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term debt (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer) identified as Convertible Notes Payable, excluding current portion. Convertible Notes Payable is a written promise to pay a note which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another, related security, at the option of the issuer and the holder.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Amortized Cost, Allowance for Credit Loss, Excluding Accrued Interest
Doc: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Premium, Noncurrent
Doc: Amount of debt premium to be amortized after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: Convertible Debt, Current
Doc: The portion of the carrying value of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Convertible debt is a financial instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as noncurrent.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss, Excluding Accrued Interest
Doc: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

TLabel: Convertible Subordinated Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TLabel: Long-term Debt, Gross
Doc: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

TLabel: Convertible Debt, Noncurrent
Doc: Carrying amount of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date, net of the amount due in the next twelve months or greater than the normal operating cycle, if longer. The debt is convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

TLabel: Convertible Subordinated Debt, Current
Doc: The portion of the carrying value of convertible subordinated debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment upon liquidation of the entity's assets.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain (Loss), before Tax
Doc: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

TLabel: Debt, Current
Doc: Amount of short-term debt and current maturity of long-term debt and capital lease obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: Debt, Long-term and Short-term, Combined Amount
Doc: Represents the aggregate of total long-term debt, including current maturities and short-term debt.

TLabel: Debt Instrument, Fair Value Disclosure
Doc: Fair value portion of debt instrument payable, including, but not limited to, notes payable and loans payable.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

TLabel: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

TLabel: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss
Doc: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

TLabel: Financial Instruments Sold, Not yet Purchased, US Government and Agency Obligations
Doc: Fair value of obligations arising from US treasury and other US government and agency debt obligations sold short.

TLabel: Financial Liabilities Fair Value Disclosure
Doc: Fair value of financial obligations, including, but not limited to, debt instruments, derivative liabilities, federal funds purchased and sold under agreements to repurchase, securities loaned or sold under agreements to repurchase, financial instruments sold not yet purchased, guarantees, line of credit, loans and notes payable, servicing liability, and trading liabilities.

TLabel: Subordinated Debt Obligations, Fair Value Disclosure
Doc: Fair value of subordinated debt obligations including, but not limited to, subordinated loan, subordinated bond, subordinated debenture or junior debt.

Doc: The portion of the carrying value of long-term convertible debt as of the balance sheet date that is scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle if longer. Convertible debt is a financial instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.
